original_text: The woman had done what the man of God had told her to do. She and her family went to live in the country of the Philistines for seven years. Kings 7 Kings 9
korean_text: 여인이 일어나서 하나님의 사람의 말대로 행하여 그의 가족과 함께 가서 블레셋 사람들의 땅에 칠 년을 우거하다가

sentences.original_text: what the man of God had told her to do
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 사람이 그녀에게 하라고 말한 것을

sentences.original_text: to live in the country of the Philistines
